item.title: Elixir - A crash course
item.description: These are notes from the official Elixir documentation. It a quick walk-through of the unique features in Elixir for someone coming from years of C — a way for me to remember and use as a reference. Summary Types Operators Control Structures Types Atoms Named contants with a value. true and false are atoms. Strings Supports unicode string natively! It’s about time. 1 You can concatenate strings using <>.
